SEARCH
Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.controllers

Class AccessController

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.controllers.AccessController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/access") public class AccessController extends Object
Controller for managing access-related operations. Provides endpoints for retrieving access records based on visitor type, external ID, and different access states (entries, exits, missing exits).

    • authorizeVisitor

      @PostMapping("/authorize") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AccessDTO> authorizeVisitor(@RequestBody AccessDTO accessDTO, @RequestHeader("x-user-id") Long userId)
      Authorize visitor with authorized ranges.
      Parameters:
      accessDTO - request.
      userId - creator.
      Returns:
      authorization created.

    • getAllAccess

      @GetMapping public PaginatedResponse<AccessDTO> getAllAccess(@Valid @Valid AccessesFilter filter, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Retrieves all access records based on filtering criteria.
      Parameters:
      filter - The filtering criteria
      page - The page number for pagination (default is 0).
      size - The number of records per page (default is 10).
      Returns:
      A list of AccessDTO containing access records.

      Returns:
      List of AccessDTOs representing entries.

      Returns:

    • getHourlyAccesses

      @GetMapping("/hourly") public List<DashboardDTO> getHourlyAccesses(@RequestParam LocalDate from, @RequestParam LocalDate to)
      Retrieves hourly access counts within a specified date range.
      Parameters:
      from - the start date of the range (inclusive)
      to - the end date of the range (inclusive)
      Returns:
      a list of DashboardDTO objects containing access counts per hour

      Parameters:

    • getAccessesByPeriod

      @GetMapping("/period") public List<DashboardDTO> getAccessesByPeriod(@RequestParam @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime from, @RequestParam @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime to, @RequestParam(required=false) VisitorType visitorType, @RequestParam(required=false) ActionTypes actionTypes, @RequestParam GroupByPeriod group, @RequestParam DataType dataType)
      Parameters:
      from - the start date/time (inclusive) of the range.
      to - the end date/time (inclusive) of the range.
      visitorType - the type of visitor for filtering (optional).
      actionTypes - the type of action for filtering (optional).
      group - the period to group the results by (DAY, WEEK, MONTH, YEAR).
      dataType - the type of data to retrieve (ALL or INCONSISTENCIES).
      Returns:
      DashboardDTO access counts grouped by the specified period.

    • getAccessesVisitorType

      @GetMapping("/inconsistent") public Long getAccessesVisitorType(@RequestParam @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime from, @RequestParam @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime to, @RequestParam(required=false) VisitorType visitorType)
      Retrieves the count of inconsistent access events within the specified date range and filtered by visitor type.
      Parameters:
      from - the start date and time (inclusive) of the range
      to - the end date and time (inclusive) of the range
      visitorType - the type of visitor to filter by
      Returns:
      the count of inconsistent access events that match the given criteria
